content.rendered:
UPCs.com (formerly SnapUPC) has its roots back to the late 1990’s before the UCC became the GS1.  Since we owned many prefixes from this time, we were able to become one of the earliest UPC sellers in the early 2000’s.  We were also involved in ecommerce during the dot com boom and the years that followed. Since that time, UPCs.com has become one of the leaders in the industry.  We’ve partnered with others in the industry, and have continually worked on expanding and providing more businesses worldwide great products, great services, and great prices.  We’re constantly working to make it easier for businesses to obtain their UPC and barcodes and sell around the world.


We’ve served tens of thousands of businesses around the world for their barcoding and UPC/EAN needs, and serving thousands more every year.  Our company lives and breathes commerce, and we operate in several industries around the world, running a network of businesses which provide services and products for millions of people every year.  We stand by our products, our services, and our reputation.

Our team is distributed worldwide, but our base is out of Denver, Colorado. We’re constantly working on improving our products and services.  Interested in becoming a partner/affiliate? Have any feedback, suggestions, and/or questions? Please don’t hesitate to reach out and contact us.  We typically reply within 12 – 24 hours or less.

You can find us across the web on:

  • LinkedIn
  • Facebook
  • YouTube
  • Google
  • TrustPilot
  • Website

Mailing Address:
UPCs.com
10685-B Hazelhurst Dr.
Houston, TX 77043 USA
Contact Us

Thanks for visiting!
